2ã€ä½¿ç”¨ Json Schema ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å…·ï¼ˆhttp://jsonschema.net/#/ï¼‰ï¼Œç”ŸæˆSchema

å·¦è¾¹çª—å£å¡«å…¥ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥è¿”å›çš„Jsonæ•°æ®ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»ã€Generate Schemaã€‘ï¼Œå³è¾¹çª—å£å°±ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ª Schemaï¼ˆæ³¨æ„ï¼šç”Ÿæˆçš„Schemaé»˜è®¤æ‰€æœ‰ "property" éƒ½æ˜¯ requiredï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦æ ¹æ®æ¥å£å¼€å‘è€…æä¾›çš„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹ Schema ä¸­çš„ "required" çš„å€¼ï¼‰ã€‚ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ myprofile æ¥å£çš„ Schemaã€‚

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "status": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "code": {
          "type": "integer"
        },
        "message": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "alert": {
          "type": "string"

          "type": "integer"
        }
      },

        "code",
        "message",
        "alert",
        "server_time"
      ]
    },
    "data": {

        "id": {

var myprofileSchema = {...æ­¤å¤„æ˜¯ä¸Šä¸€æ­¥ç”Ÿæˆçš„ Schema}

Schema validation é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯ç¤ºä¾‹ { "code": 302, "message": "Missing required property: tips_array", "dataPath": "/data/item", "schemaPath": "/properties/data/properties/item/required/35", "subErrors": null }

å‚è€ƒğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡

Usage 1: Simple validation

var valid = tv4.validate(data, schema);

If validation returns false, then an explanation of why validation failed can be found in tv4.error.

The error object will look something like: json { "code": 0, "message": "Invalid type: string", "dataPath": "/intKey", "schemaPath": "/properties/intKey/type" } æ›´å¤šå…³äº tv4ï¼Œè¯·è‡³ğŸ‘‰ğŸ‘‰ğŸ‘‰https://github.com/geraintluff/tv4
